speak Penny "Hi, @! It's nice of you to visit me at work.^Hi, @! It's nice of you to visit me at work.$h"/
speak Vincent "Hello Mr. @! Are you going to study with us today?^Hello Ms. @! Are you going to study with us today?$h"/

speak Jas "Ms. Penny...$0#$b#Why is Mr. @ looking at you like that?^Why is Ms. @ looking at you like that?$h"/

showFrame Penny 0/
speak Penny "Well, when two people love each other very much...$h#$b# It's impossible to hide it.$0#$b# I guess that Mr. @ and I can't hide how we feel about each other.^I guess that Ms. @ and I can't hide how we feel about each other.$4#$b#You two are very smart children, so you must already know what's going on.$0#$b#But I would like to formally introduce you to my boyfriend!^But I would like to formally introduce you to my girlfriend!$h"/

pause 1000/
speak Penny "This has been a very good class today! I'm proud of you two for behaving so well.$0#$b#Maybe Mr. @ should help out more often, since he has such a positive influence on you!^Maybe Ms. @ should help out more often, since she has such a positive influence on you!$h"/
emote farmer 32/
speak Penny "Well children, could you please go to the front desk and ask Gunther if our newest textbooks have come in?$0#$b#I'll be there in just a moment. I need to talk with Mr. @ for a minute.^I'll be there in just a moment. I need to talk with Ms. @ for a minute.$0"/

speak Penny "Hey, you.$4#$b# @, I want you to know... $4#$b#I'm happy to have you as my partner. I'm so glad that you want me just like I want you.$4#$b#Your affection, your attention, your care for me... it means so much.$4#$b# I've been thinking a lot about our date in the bathhouse, and how sweet and intimate it felt.$4#$b#It made me feel things I've never felt before, for anyone. $4#$b# My heart feels full to overflowing, and I get all warm and fuzzy and giggly just thinking about you.$4#$b# And it's like I can't stop smiling. $4#$b#@, what I'm trying to say is... $4#$b#I love you. $4#$b#What do you do?$h#$b#$q 1627903 null##$r 1627903 0 event_loveInMuseum1#(say 'I love you too Penny!' and go in for a kiss)#$r 1627904 -70 event_loveInMuseum2#(say 'Thank you')"/

end dialogue Penny "Thanks for helping me out today. I love you, sweetie! $1#$b# I don't think I'll ever get tired of saying that, or hearing it.$0"
